p: During each influenza surveillance season, ECDC collects weekly case-based data on hospitalized laboratory-confirmed influenza cases admitted to ICU from a number of European Union (EU)/European Economic Area (EEA) Member States [ 22, 23]. The data for the seasons 2009–2010 to 2016–2017 (weeks 40–20) were retrieved from the European Surveillance System (TESSy) database. A description of the surveillance systems in the countries reporting data is available at FluNewsEurope webpage [ 24].
